reviewText: Li I Min stars as a young pupil, who decides to follow a Mantis style master, who he thinks is good, but turns out to be the exact opposite.  After finding out the masters secrets, he realizes that the man he was following, also is the man that brought death to members of his family.  And Revenge quickly becomes his drive.  Neat fights, and some great mantis style make this another Chessboxing collection film that has to be purchased.
